com.force.sdk.test.util
Class BaseJPAFTest

java.lang.Object
  com.force.sdk.test.util.BaseTestNGTest
      com.force.sdk.test.util.BaseJPAFTest
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.testng.ITest
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseMultiEntityManagerJPAFTest
public abstract class BaseJPAFTest
extends BaseTestNGTest

Create a test org and establish the test context based on the test org. This base class uses the standard javax.Persistence implementation to bootstrap the persistence context.
